active_incidents.title: Some users may be experiencing issues uploading files.

notes.body: Some users are seeing signs of improvement, but we're still working towards a full resolution. If you're experiencing any trouble, please reload Slack using Command + Shift + R (Mac) or Ctrl + Shift + R. We'll be back with another update as soon as the issue is fully resolved.

We have determined that less than 1% of customers are experiencing issues with file uploads at this time. We are continuing to investigate this issue as a priority. We’ll continue to provide updates as we know more.
We’re still actively investigating an issue uploading files. All workspace users may experience trouble uploading files. We’ll provide another update as soon as we have more information to share.
We’re looking into an issue where Guests in a workspace are unable to upload files and we’ll let you know as we learn more. Thank you for bearing with us in the meantime.
